attributes.action: call on global leaders to suspend markets for 28 days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A possible solution to unfreeze intra-bank lending.
1: Close stock markets globally for 28 days, prevents speculation, aids stability.
2: 14 days for government/external auditors to assess real exposure in balance sheets against a steady market. External auditors work on much reduced day rates, its about survival, not padding fees.
3: 14 days for the auditors to work out which firms are in need, to what extent, 14 days to arrange structured equity bailouts etc and make strategic loans (Gvt Loans) direct to profitable firms who's banks are frozen.
4: Legal obligation for banks etc to show all and come clean without affecting share price as mkts closed
5: Exchanges + banks, Media, sorry a forced 1 month holiday on trading commissions, revenues etc just tough luck, 11 months out of 12 isnt bad.
6: Some consumer credit/ debt to be taken on by governments who regulate, at lower interest rates and can "attach" deduction to salaries like PAYE/NI is currently.
7: Interest rates cut, co-ordinated, globally, by 1.5% (except Japan obviously)
8: Markets reopen after 28 days, unknown knowns are known, known unknowns now known, unknown unknown's known etc.....stability.
